snippet: As the storm approached, disaster preparation was tinged by a fresh sense of vulnerability in a region that has learned not to underestimate nature.
abstract: Residents of New York region, recalling massive damage caused by Hurricane Sandy just three months before, rush to prepare for approaching snowstorm with new urgency.

byline.contributor: Joseph Berger, Nate Schweber and Alex Vadukul contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: As the storm approached, disaster preparation was tinged by a fresh sense of vulnerability in a region that has learned not to underestimate nature.

headline.seo: After Hurricane Sandy, Preparing for Snowstorm With New Urgency
headline.main: Just a Storm? Not After the Hurricane
headline.print_headline: Recalling Hurricane Sandy, Residents Prepare for a Snowstorm With New Urgency
